alert.note: Alert for Cross; Lee; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 2:29AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lee, St. Francis, south central Poinsett and Cross Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cherry Valley to near Palestine. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Parkin, Madison, Palestine, Village Creek State Park, Cherry Valley, Caldwell, Colt, Wheatley, Widener, Moro, Haynes, Garret Grove, Vanndale, New Salem, Cottonwood Corner, Fitzgerald Crossing, New Castle and Round Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
